    • devCardPainter

      public static void devCardPainter​(java.lang.String[][] target, int V_OFFSET, int H_OFFSET, java.lang.String content)
      this method prints a development card
      Parameters:
      target - is the matrix in which the item will be painted
      V_OFFSET - is the vertical position of the item
      H_OFFSET - is the horizontal position of the item
      content - is a String that represents the content of the item

    • paintWarehouse

      public static void paintWarehouse​(java.lang.String[][] target, int V_OFFSET, int H_OFFSET, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> structure, java.util.List<ResQuantity> resources)
      this method is used to paint a warehouse
      Parameters:
      target - is the matrix in which the item will be painted
      V_OFFSET - is the vertical position of the item
      H_OFFSET - is the horizontal position of the item
      structure - represents the number of default shelves and their size
      resources - is the content of the warehoyse

    • paintPersonalProduction

      public static void paintPersonalProduction​(java.lang.String[][] target, int V_OFFSET, int H_OFFSET, java.util.List<ResQuantity> materials, java.util.List<ResQuantity> products, int customM, int customP)

      Parameters:
      target - is the matrix in which the item will be painted
      V_OFFSET - is the vertical position of the item
      H_OFFSET - is the horizontal position of the item
      materials - is the list of materials in the production
      products - is the list of products in the production
      customM - is the number of custom materials in the production
      customP - is the number of custom products in the production

    • paintMarketBoard

      public static void paintMarketBoard​(java.lang.String[][] target, int V_OFFSET, int H_OFFSET, java.util.List<Marble> marbles, int nRows, int nColumns)
      Parameters:
      target - is the matrix in which the item will be painted
      V_OFFSET - is the vertical position of the item
      H_OFFSET - is the horizontal position of the item
      marbles - represents the current state of the market
      nRows - is the number of rows of the market
      nColumns - is the number of columns of the market

    • paintFaithTrack

      public static void paintFaithTrack​(java.lang.String[][] target, int V_OFFSET, int H_OFFSET, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> trackPoints, java.util.List<java.lang.String> players, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> faith, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> start, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> end)
      this method is used to paint the player's FaithTrack
      Parameters:
      target - is the matrix in which the item will be painted
      V_OFFSET - is the vertical position of the item
      H_OFFSET - is the horizontal position of the item
      trackPoints - represents the structure of the FaithTrack
      players - is a list of the names of the players
      faith - is a map that contains the faith achieved by the players
      start - is the start of the vatican report sections
      end - is the end of the vatican report sections

    • paintPopeFavours

      public static void paintPopeFavours​(java.lang.String[][] target, int V_OFFSET, int H_OFFSET, int nPlayers, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> trackPoints, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> sectionPoints)
      this method is used to paint the PopeFavors
      Parameters:
      target - is the matrix on which the PopeFavors will be printed
      V_OFFSET - is the vertical position of the item
      H_OFFSET - is the horizontal position of the item
      nPlayers - is the number of players in the game
      trackPoints - represents the structure of the FaithTrack
      sectionPoints - represents the points associated to each vatican section

    • paintEndGameBox

      Parameters:
      target - is the matrix in which the item will be painted
      V_OFFSET - is the vertical position of the item
      H_OFFSET - is the horizontal position of the item
      players - contains the name of the players and the points obtained
      winner - the nickname of the winner
